price: 36. Wixii la idin siiyo oo wuxuun ah waa uun sahay dhammaaneysa ee nolosha adduunkan, waxase Alle agtiisa ah baa u khayr badan oo daa’insan kuwa (Xaqa) rumeysan ee Rabbigood tala saarta.
arabic: فَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَمَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: famā ūtītum min shayin famatāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wamā ʿinda al-lahi khayrun wa-abqā lilladhīna āmanū waʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūna
